summary: This document is an email chain from January 6, 2021, between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling a follow-up call related to an unspecified matter. The sender is identified as the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, proposing a follow-up call.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Follow-up Call
events.description: Email exchange discussing the scheduling of a brief follow-up call, initiated by the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The correspondence is dated January 6, 2021, a date of significant political events in the United States.
The email originates from the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The content is heavily redacted, with all specific names and email addresses replaced with '(USANYS)'.
The purpose is to schedule a follow-up call, with the team suggesting it would be helpful for the recipient to reach out to an unspecified party.
